abstract: Warren E. Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway has sold off another swath of stock in Moody’s, unloading another 560,000 shares in the e credit ratings agency.
snippet: Warren E. Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway has sold off another swath of stock in Moody’s, unloading another 560,000 shares in the e credit ratings agency.
lead_paragraph: For the second time this month, Warren E. Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway has sold off stock in Moody’s, the credit ratings agency, The Associated Press reported.

headline.main: Buffett Sells Another Chunk of Moody’s Shares
